item.description:
Herb Pearce is hosting a singles party! Here is a description of the event from Herb:

"A party for singles. Bring your friends. I'll be available to type people, answer your Enneagram or other typing system questions for Myers-Briggs, Personal Thinking Patterns or Astrology. I plan on having name tags with personality types so you can ask questions to each other about your similarities and differences. Who knows? Maybe you'll meet someone special.

There will be some trivia questions asked about famous politicians, actors/actresses and sports figures and their types and some prizes will be awarded for the most accurate answers!

Party from 7pm-11pm. Show up anytime. I'll provide some vegetarian snacks and dishes. Bring other vegetarian snacks or dishes if you want to bring something, though it's not a requirement to bring anything but yourself. Bring drinks if you want, including wine. Cost $10."

www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Singles Party - Featuring the Enneagram, Trivia and Prizes
